definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives

sentences.english: The bill, which has 31 co-sponsors, has been forwarded to the House Ways and Means Committee for consideration.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案已提交众议院筹款委员会审议。

sentences.english: HW1. The Illinois House impeaches Governor Rod Blagojevich.
sentences.chinese: 伊利诺亚州众议院弹劾了州长罗德。

sentences.english: The House of Representatives approved similar legislation in December.
sentences.chinese: 众议院在十二月也通过了类似的法案。

sentences.english: The version in the GOP-dominated House has not yet been given a hearing.
sentences.chinese: 共和党主宰的众议院还未对此举行听证会。

sentences.english: House Republicans have said they will not compromise with the president.
sentences.chinese: 众议院的共和党人说，他们不会与总统妥协。

sentences.english: If the House votes for impeachment, the case then goes to the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 弹劾案在众议院通过后即转交参议院审理。

sentences.english: K. G. is a Democratic congresswoman from New York.
sentences.chinese: 是一位来自纽约的民主党众议院女议员。

sentences.english: We pour House legislation into the senatorial saucer to cool it.
sentences.chinese: 我们把众议院立法这道茶倒入参议员这个茶杯来冷却。

sentences.english: It is unclear how the House and Senate can resolve the impasse.
sentences.chinese: 目前不清楚众议院和参议院如何打破这个僵局。

sentences.english: Well, how about John Boehner, the House minority leader?
sentences.chinese: 众议院少数党领导约翰伯纳值得关注。

sentences.english: Obama said, alluding to House Oversight Committee Chairman Darrell Issa.
sentences.chinese: 其实是暗指众议院监督委员会主席达雷尔伊萨。

sentences.english: Gates added that both Republican and Democratic lawmakers in the House had also called for a no-fly zone over Libya.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨补充说在众议院中两党议员都曾呼吁设立禁飞区。

sentences.english: Bernanke is scheduled to testify tomorrow before the House Financial Services Committee.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克定于明天向众议院金融服务委员会作证。

sentences.english: But the House of Representatives did not follow him.
sentences.chinese: 但是众议院的议员们并没有追随他。

sentences.english: But the Senate added so-called sweeteners for the House.
sentences.chinese: 但参议院为众议院增加了所谓的甜味剂。

sentences.english: Orbach called on the Senate to reverse the House cuts.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴赫请求参议院推翻众议院的削减预算法案。

definition: abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
member of the US House of Representatives
